generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks and lane markings, which is clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and lined with shops and benches.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, featuring commercial signs and windows.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible on the sidewalk, including an older man walking on the left side.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along the right side of the road, and a few are driving in the distance.
- truck: A yellow truck is visible parked on the right side of the road, behind some parked cars.
- train: The tram tracks running down the center of the road indicate the presence of a train (tram) system, although no train is currently visible.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast with some clouds and electrical wires.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the distance, lining the street and providing some greenery.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs along the street.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including those for parking and directions, mounted on poles or attached to buildings.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right side of the road, near the front of the image.
